description: Least multiple of n that is greater than n, not equal to a power of 10 times n and contains all the digits of n.
links: Harvey P. Dale, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
example: a(14) = 154 = 14*11 and contains the digits 1 and 4.
author: _Amarnath Murthy_, May 20 2001
extensions: Corrected and extended by _Matthew Conroy_, May 28 2001
